abstract: New York Knicks announce that they have signed their first-round draft picks, forward Kristaps Porzingis and point guard Jerian Grant.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks announced that they have signed their first-round draft picks, Kristaps Porzingis and Jerian Grant.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Basketball; Knicks Sign First-Round Draft Picks

snippet: The Knicks announced that they have signed their first-round draft picks, Kristaps Porzingis and Jerian Grant.
